title: Tic Tac Toe
description: It is a Tic Tac Toe game where you can play against the computer, testing your strategy and skills.

title: Netflix
description: Netflix Clone offers a platform to discover movies and TV shows, with detailed pages, ratings, trailers, cast, and user accounts.

title: Typing Test
description: Typing Test allows users to test their typing speed and accuracy by typing out a given paragraph within a set time limit.
